name: Gravekeeper
description:
Maneuver wandering souls into empty graves as a gravekeeper. Every move counts. 

  • A/D : Turn Left / Right
  • W/S :  Forward / Backward
  • LMB: Grab
  • RMB: Undo

A Sokoban-type game, inspired by Stephen's Sausage Roll.

Made by Fungeey & Lightningstudios

2018 GamesThatAreCool
